trans-unit.source: Provides validation of a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 物件的驗證。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator> class is used to ensure that a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object meets specific criteria.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator>類別用來確保<xref:System.TimeSpan>物件符合特定準則。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.%23ctor%2A> constructor with two parameters ensures that both a minimum and a maximum <xref:System.TimeSpan> value are adhered to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.%23ctor%2A>具有兩個參數的建構函式時，可確保最小值和最多<xref:System.TimeSpan>遵守值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.%23ctor%2A> constructor with three parameters checks both the minimum and maximum <xref:System.TimeSpan> values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.%23ctor%2A>最小值和最大值的三個參數的建構函式會檢查<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，以及是否驗證範圍是獨占。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.%23ctor%2A> constructor with four parameters checks the previous three parameters and also checks whether the <xref:System.TimeSpan> value is equal to a specific number of seconds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.%23ctor%2A>四個參數的建構函式會檢查先前的三個參數，以及也檢查是否<xref:System.TimeSpan>值相當於特定的秒數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.CanValidate%2A> method determines whether the object type being validated matches the expected type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.CanValidate%2A>方法會判斷要驗證的物件型別是否符合預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: The object being validated is passed as a parameter of the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 正在驗證的物件會傳遞做為參數的<xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator> type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator>型別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the minimum time allowed to pass validation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 物件，會指定通過驗證所允許的最短時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the maximum time allowed to pass validation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 物件，會指定通過驗證所允許的最長時間。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator" /> class, based on supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: 根據提供的參數，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.%23ctor%2A> constructor with two parameters is used, the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator> object validates that a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value adheres to a specific range.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.%23ctor%2A>具有兩個參數的建構函式使用時，<xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator>物件驗證<xref:System.TimeSpan>遵守特定範圍的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the minimum time allowed to pass validation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 物件，會指定通過驗證所允許的最短時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the maximum time allowed to pass validation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 物件，會指定通過驗證所允許的最長時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether the validation range is exclusive.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，會指定驗證範圍是否為獨佔。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator" /> class, based on supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: 根據提供的參數，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.%23ctor%2A> constructor checks both the minimum and maximum <xref:System.TimeSpan> values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.%23ctor%2A>最小值和最大值的建構函式會檢查<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，以及是否驗證範圍是獨占。

trans-unit.source: When the `rangeIsExclusive` parameter is set to `true`, the <xref:System.TimeSpan> value must not be between the `minValue` and `maxValue` values.
trans-unit.target: 當`rangeIsExclusive`參數設定為`true`、<xref:System.TimeSpan>值不能介於`minValue`和`maxValue`值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the minimum time allowed to pass validation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 物件，會指定通過驗證所允許的最短時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the maximum time allowed to pass validation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 物件，會指定通過驗證所允許的最長時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether the validation range is exclusive.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，會指定驗證範圍是否為獨佔。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies a number of seconds.
trans-unit.target: 指定秒數的 <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator" /> class, based on supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: 根據提供的參數，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When the `resolutionInSeconds` parameter is specified, the <xref:System.TimeSpan> object being validated must be equal to this value in order to pass validation.
trans-unit.target: 當`resolutionInSeconds`指定參數，<xref:System.TimeSpan>物件驗證必須等於此值才能通過驗證。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator>類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="resolutionInSeconds" /> is less than <see langword="0" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="resolutionInSeconds" /> 小於 <see langword="0" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="minValue" /> is greater than <paramref name="maxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="minValue" /> 大於 <paramref name="maxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的類型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the type of the object can be validated.
trans-unit.target: 判斷是否可以驗證物件的型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="type" /> parameter matches a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="type" /> 參數符合 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.CanValidate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.CanValidate%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator>類別。

trans-unit.source: The value of an object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value of an object is valid.
trans-unit.target: 判斷物件的值是否有效。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator> object contains the rules necessary to validate a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator>物件包含規則需要驗證<xref:System.TimeSpan>物件。

trans-unit.source: The rules are established when an instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator> class is created.
trans-unit.target: 規則的執行個體時，會建立<xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator>類別建立。

trans-unit.source: The object to validate is passed as a parameter of the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的物件會傳遞做為參數的<xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator>類別。
